response.original_title: Seppun Ryokou – Ryokou chuu Zutto Kisu shitara... Motto Suki ni Natte Hanarerarenaku Narimashita. Bero o Karamase Karada o Kasaneta Ippaku Futsuka no Koibito Deeto
response.overview: Jun Suehiro and Nia, two close friends, embark on a private two-day trip. As they travel together, their kisses become more frequent, and with each one, their feelings deepen until they can no longer part. What begins as a quiet getaway turns into a profound emotional and physical experience—tongues entwined, bodies embraced, and a bond that becomes unbreakable. A lesbian documentary capturing the tenderness, desire, and surrender of two women discovering each other through the journey.
response.title: Seppun Ryokou – Ryokou chuu Zutto Kisu shitara... Motto Suki ni Natte Hanarerarenaku Narimashita. Bero o Karamase Karada o Kasaneta Ippaku Futsuka no Koibito Deeto: Jun Suehiro & Nia

titles.title: Seppun Ryokō – Ryokō chū Zutto Kisu shitara... Motto Suki ni Natte Hanarerarenaku Narimashita. Bero o Karamase Karada o Kasaneta Ippaku Futsuka no Koibito Dēto - Suehiro Jun & Nia
